H0.text: where was the film the remains of the day filmed. Badminton House

H1.text: where was the film the remains of the day filmed. Chatsworth House

H2.text: where was the film the remains of the day filmed. Blenheim Palace

H3.text: where was the film the remains of the day filmed. Dyrham Park

A4.text: The film used Dyrham Park for the exterior of the house and the driveway.

A5.text: The film used Badminton House for servants' quarters, conservatory, and entrance hall.

A6.text: Dyrham Park was one of the houses used as a filming location for the 1993 Merchant Ivory film The Remains of the Day.

A7.text: others included Badminton House and Powderham Castle.
